deleteGroupConfirmation.formatContent: Are you sure you want to delete {0}? Deleting this group will remove it from your list.

lblInstructions: Registration groups control when students can register for courses. Add a registration group to control when students of different majors can register.

registrationGroupsEdit.lblErrorDatesRange: Start date is after end date
registrationGroupsEdit.lblErrorTimesRange: Start time is after end time
registrationGroupsEdit.lblInvalidDaysFromBaseDate: Days from base date is from -9999 to 9999
registrationGroupsEdit.lblNameDuplicated: Group name is duplicated. Enter a unique name.
registrationGroupsEdit.lblSortDuplicated: Order is duplicated. Enter a unique order.
registrationGroupsEdit.lblWarningPreRegistrationDate: Date is earlier than the pre-registration date
registrationGroupsEdit.lblWarningRegistrationDate: Date is after the last date of registration
